name: Embrrr
description:
Game submission for Mini Jam 124: Warmth

A simple game where you control a small ember on a mission to warm up the entire... area? The game ends when you return to your starting point and check-in while the average temperature of the area is above the threshold.

Capture "towers" to create beacons of warmth on the desolate cold wastes. But remember, they will revert back to their cooling nature after a period of time.

Use your points to launch a volley of fireballs to help you warm up the place at the cost of some of your points. 

[The game works fine in browser but can experience low framerates (A.K.A. not well optimized) it runs better when run via the executable.]

Controls:

  • Move: [WASD] or Arrow keys
  • Capture tower/check-in at home: [Space]
  • Fire Volley: [LeftShift] or [RightShift] 

Known Issues: 

  • Sprites are lame and UI is shoddy. I'm not an artist
  • Poor framerate when played in browser
  • No sound
